name: u5_deezersearch
description: In this exercise, you have to setup a project for compiling a TypeScript program. You will get a ready-made website that can be used to search music tracks on [Deezer](https://www.deezer.com/). It uses [Deezer's free, public music search API](https://developers.deezer.com/api/search). The provided website consists of the following parts:
